Katie Angermeier Haab

Accomplished director and writer with over 15 years of managing experience in coordinating small- and large-scale projects, workshops, event, or businesses. I'm a self-starter and team motivator with excellent communication skills--written and speaking--with people of varying backgrounds, ages, and demographics. I'm flexible, able to pivot whenever necessary, and I thrive in a lively, creative atmosphere.
